string.name: name
string.value: The Curse of the Black Witch

...Wait, is this Ereve? But Ereve's usually not like this. And why are the Chief Knights standing like that? No one's answering! Only #p1101001# seemed to be barely awake. I better talk to #b#p1101001##k.

#p1101001# told me the lady in front is actually #r#p1104002# the #o9001010##k and that she has put a curse on everyone in Ereve. He mentioned that most of them on the island should be able to weather it, but the Empress might be in grave danger... I better defeat #o9001010# and break the curse now! \n\n#o9001010##r #a204071##k

The cunning #o9001010#, after realizing that Ereve, which is protected by #p1101001#, may be hard to enter, used #p1103000# to throw in cursed items, then cursed the whole island through that! Fortunately, after defeating #o9001010#, the curse seems to have been lifted.

...Yes... that lady... you see in front of you... she is #r#o9001010# #p1104002##k... She has casted the curse on all of Ereve, which means... you'll need to defeat #o9001010# immediately! Other people have more stamina, but.. the Empress... that's different.
...You were able to defeat #o9001010#. Cygnus Knight... I can feel that the curse is slowly fading away and that the Empress is safe.
As #p1101001# whose job is to protect the Empress, I commend thee for your work.
...That lady right there is #r#o9001010# #p1104002##k... The source of all these things...! You better defeat #o9001010# to break the curse...!
